# init(named:)

**Initializer**

Returns a sharing service instance representing the specified service name.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(named serviceName: NSSharingService.Name)
```

## Parameters

- **serviceName**: The service name. The possible system provided values are listed in `Available Sharing Services`.

## Return Value

An instance of `NSSharingService` for the specified service name.

## Related Documentation

- **sharingServices(forItems:)**: Returns a list of sharing services which could share all the provided items together.
- **canPerform(withItems:)**: Returns whether the service can share all the specified items.

## Creating a Sharing Service

- **init(title:image:alternateImage:handler:)**: Creates a custom sharing service object.
- **NSSharingService.Name**: Constants that describe the sharing services that macOS supports.
